section_purpose: To validate the effectiveness of IB-Net through a case study on three circuits from the LEC industrial dataset, comparing runtime performance with the Kissat SAT solver.
key_points: Case study conducted on three circuits from the LEC industrial dataset.
Runtime of IB-Net compared with the original Kissat method.
Scatter plots (Fig. 5) illustrate the comparisons for each SAT problem.
IB-Net consistently outperforms Kissat across various problem sizes.
The method demonstrates scalability and efficiency in handling large and complex problems, confirming practical applicability in real-world LEC.

algorithms: IB-Net (proposed neural network method for SAT solving)
datasets: LEC industrial dataset, with focus on three specific circuits

reproducibility_notes: Details of the three circuits used in the study
Runtime comparison methodology and measurement procedures
Access to the LEC industrial dataset or equivalent
Implementation details for IB-Net and Kissat
